entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS map control intermittent crash #26624
  • Cannot apply app theme bindings for VisualStateGroup Setters in code #26620
  • Border label text cut off #26619
  • Double click back button #26617
  • Compiled code binding isn't intercepted #26616
  • Globe image appearing when selecting an anchor tag in MAUI blazor & crash in VS2022 #26615
  • ScrollView Does Not Work When Touching a Custom Grid with PanGestureRecognizer in .NET MAUI (iOS) #26612
  • Shell TabBar always hide under navigation bar on Android 35 #26611
  • Feature Request: SelectedItemBackgroundColor Property for MAUI ListView Control #26604
  • .Net Maui Crash OnResume #26601
  • Button always overlaps (infront) of other views #26600
  • MA003 false positive with 9.0.21 #26599
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Tabbar disappears when navigating back from page with hidden TabBar in iOS 18 #26598
    .NET 9 Servicing

Closed

  • Intellisense unable to track the Images folder structure in the default Resources folder #26622
  • Bugs in Absolute Layout with .NET 9 #26317
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Picker ItemsSource changed case exception: Value does not fall within the expected range #25792
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Shadow property in BoxView in .NET MAUI #26610
  • ILLINK and Release Versions specify different Xcode versions #26605
  • ObservableCollection changing after page with ListView it was bound to closed with PopModalAsync #26577
  • Add true SVG support #26597
  • The keyboard is not opening in the Android 15 simulator #26587
  • Setting Source on a binding when x:DataType is set is not allowed #26580
  • iPad - ActionSheet does not stay in the centre of the screen on orientation change #26560
    .NET 9 SR3
  • After updating to v9.0.21, the Preferences storage has been relocated from the LocalAppData folder to the AppData folder on the Windows platform. #26602
  • MacCatalyst currently doesn't surface unhandled exceptions in user code so we should help MAUI users out #7176
    Backlog
  • Why ColortoInverseColorConverter requires [RequireService] ? #26589
  • workload error #26596
  • maui accessibility FlyOutItem not speaking by screenreader #20319

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Add unit test jobs to dnceng builds #26623
  • [testing] Try make tests more stable #26621
    area-testing, testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci
  • [Windows] Fix for Exception occurring when using the GroupShortNameBinding in a Grouped ListView #26613
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 49 #26609
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for CarouselView reverts to displaying 1st item in collection when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 48 #26607
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 47 #26606
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10696069 #26556
    area-templates
  • Fix for Picker ItemsSource changed case exception: Value does not fall within the expected range #26325
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 44 #26563
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Invert SourceRect width/height on orientation change for ActionSheet #26561
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 45 #26564
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Revert "[iOS] Fixed HeaderFooterGrid to pass on CV1 and CV2 " #26595

Updated

  • Don’t call NSAttributedString with HTML from a background thread #26153
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android]: Preserve the ActivityResultRegistry During MauiAppCompatActivity Creation #25404
    platform/android 🤖, area-core-lifecycle, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Use a GeneralWrapperView for a Flyout View #26461
    community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS] Inherit UIContainerView from MauiView #26576
    area-architecture, community ✨
  • Fixed Net 8: Page and control Unloaded events firing on iOS when navigating to another page #25852
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] Fix Shell animation and button visual states on Shell nav #26521
    area-navigation
  • Fixed Extra Padding on iOS buttons required when image on top or bottom #26018
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Add the scenario tests for the skiasharp backend #26591
    area-testing
  • [iOS] CollectionView item sizing wrong after refresh #21736
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [ci] Enable source index #26557
    area-infrastructure, t/docs 📝, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fixed Shell Navigating event issue when switching tabs #25749
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Disable `MeasureInvalidated` propagation by default / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix android image loading race condition and improve logging #25870
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • [Android] Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, stale
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings #26593
    area-infrastructure
  • [XC] fix excessive boxing #26465
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] Fix ImageButton Padding the third #25223
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Fix for CollectionView with RefreshView when ObservableCollection<T>.Clear() throws System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #26573
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 46 #26570
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Setting Window.TitleBar to null does not remove the customization  #26568
    community ✨, area-controls-titlebar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix for Flyout closing when updating the FlyoutPage.Detail #26425
    do-not-merge, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix more things with fonts (embedded) and unpackaged apps #26515
    area-fonts
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation when layout updates #25662
    area-layout, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed picker allows user input if the keyboard is visible #26382
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Inconsistent Resize Behavior for Header/Footer - fix #26456
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix Gray Line Appears on the Right Side of GraphicsView with Decimal WidthRequest #26368
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for SearchHandler Fails to Display Results. #26572
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed CheckBox enabled color is not updated properly #26399
    community ✨, area-controls-checkbox, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for UI not updating GridItemsLayout when Span becomes 1. #26370
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 40 #26491
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
